# Stunning Finale (Spell)
## Overview
[[Enchantment Spells|Enchantment]] ([[Compulsion Spells|compulsion]]) \[[[Mind-Affecting Spells|mind-affecting]]]

**Level:** [[5th Level Bard Spells|Bard 5]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 9th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 9]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Targets:** Up to 3 creatures, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart

**Duration:** 1 round

**Saving Throw:** Fortitude partial; see text

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Advanced Player's Guide, pg. 247

You must have a bardic performance in effect to cast this spell. With a flourish, you immediately end your bardic performance, assaulting the senses of the targets with your finale. Each target is [[Stunned|stunned]] for 1 round. On a successful saving throw, a target is [[Staggered|staggered]] for 1 round.
